DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine diurnal nocturnal effect Travoprost SofZia ( Travatan Z ) intraocular pressure ocular perfusion pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Diurnal Nocturnal Effect Travatan With SofZia Preservative Intraocular Pressure Ocular Perfusion Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hypothesize Travatan Z significantly low intraocular pressure increase ocular perfusion pressure diurnal nocturnal period , 24-hour evaluation , compare baseline . The investigator hypothesize medication effect persist 72 hour discontinuation drug .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension , include pigment dispersion glaucoma pseudoexfoliation glaucoma Age ≥ 18 ≤ 90 year , either gender , race/ethnicity Females currently pregnant plan become pregnant , determined history study period Diagnosis form glaucoma openangle Schaffer angle grade < 2 either eye gonioscopy Chronic , recurrent , severe inflammatory eye disease Intraocular surgery within 6 month laser within 3 month History active , recurrent , chronic ocular infection Herpes Simplex Virus History cystoid macular edema Inability safely discontinue ocular medication 4 week Patients smoke irregular daily sleep pattern Patients start changed glucocorticoid therapy last 3 month Patients currently undergo medical marijuana therapy Any use nonFDA approve medication glaucoma last 3 month
